A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. The creators of this movie should be ashamed for this atrocious product. This is\, without a doubt\, the worst Star Wars film ever made. Yes\, I am including the prequels.  Not only does it fail as a Star Wars movie\, it is also just a bad movie on its own\, and one of the worst films of 2017.  As a stand alone movie\, it has a nonsensical script with terrible writing suggestive of simple directorial incompetence and poor storytelling. As a star Wars film\, it takes what has come before and throws it out the window\, paying no respect for the world created by 8 previous films.  A real shame. The best that can be hoped for is for this movie to be stricken from canon and slated for a reboot one day.
